column1: Smoque BBQ////Wow - the best way to do this place is to order in.  The line is OOC but the food is great.  I recommend the cornbread and mac&cheese as sides.  The pulled pork is great.  The only reason I am giving this 3 stars is because I had my first case of heartburn from this place!  It was horrendous.  But try it - it's delicious!
